c1.text: All good! Just finished a great book. What's up with you?
Thik hai, just chilling at home. Watched a new series today.

c2.text: New job posting available! Check your dashboard now for more details.
Group members have changed. Click to view the updated list.

c3.text: Hey, you okay? Haven't heard from you in a while.
ü•∫ü•∫ Not really, had a tough day at work.

c4.text: Reminder: Project submission deadline extended till 15th Oct. Please submit your work by then.
Thanks for the update! Will make sure to finish it on time.

c5.text: Beta, khana khaya? Aaj kitchen mein kuchh naya banaya hai.
Haan papa, abhi khaya! Bahut swaadista tha.

c6.text: Bhai kahaan hai? Chal chai peene, main cafe mein hoon.
Aata hu 10 min mein. Traffic thoda hai.

c7.text: Kal call karungi, thoda busy hoon aaj office mein.
Thik hai Di, take care! Apne aap ka dhyaan rakhna.

c8.text: Can you please share the invoice for the last payment? We need it for our records.
Yes, I will send it by evening. Just need to find it in my emails.
Thanks. Appreciate the quick response. It's quite urgent.

c9.text: Aaj paneer banaya hai, jaldi ghar aaja. Tujhe bahut pasand hai.
Wow! Love you Maa ‚ù§Ô∏è. Main 15 min mein ghar hoon.

c10.text: Match kab hai bhai? Main kal se taiyaar hoon.
Sunday ko 5 baje. Full team ready hai. Toh chal perfect hai.
Great, I'll bring the drinks. Kya peena pasand karega team?

c11.text: Your order is being prepared by the restaurant. It will be ready soon.
Your order has been picked up by the delivery partner. Estimated delivery time is 30 minutes.

c12.text: Bhai kal ka plan? Movie + dinner? Maine tickets book kar liye hain.
Done! Book karle tu restaurant bhi. Main 6 baje aata hoon.

c13.text: Wow, amazing progress on your portfolio site. Loved the animations and the color scheme. Great job Deepak! Kaise kiya tu yeh?
Thanks Sakshi! Glad you liked it üòÑ. Bahut mehnat lagi hai ismein.

c14.text: Meeting reminder: Our quarterly review is scheduled for next Friday at 10 AM. Please prepare your reports.
Got it. I'll have my report ready by Thursday for review.

c15.text: Hey, do you want to join us for a weekend trip to the mountains? We are leaving Friday evening.
Sounds amazing! Count me in. What should I bring along?
